amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the Senior Medicare Patrols within the Health Care Fraud and Abuse Control Account by $2,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 65 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for the Senior Medicare Patrols within the Health Care Fraud and Abuse Control Account by $2,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A062) Agreed to by recorded vote: 316 - 103 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A062) Agreed to by recorded vote: 316 - 103 (Roll no. 311).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Ms. Porter.
